text:
July 12, 1956
Miss Marjorie McKinney
2805 Stratford Avenue
Cincinnati 20, Ohio
Dear Miss McKinneys
In answer to your recent request, we would like to give you informa¬
tion regarding membership in the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters.
The NAEB has three categories of membership, as follows:
Active - Educational institutions, public service organizations,
etc. owning and operating their own radio and/or tele¬
vision stations.
Associate - Institutions (as above) not owning stations, but
operating production centers and regularly produc¬
ing programs over a commercial outlet.
Affiliate - Ary organization or individual interested in the
general furtherance of educational broadcasting.
For Active members with radio stations, dues in the association are
based on rated transmitter power, as follows:
Class A - £ kw and over - $50.00
Class B - 1 - iw9 kw - 25*00
Class C - less than 1 kw - 15*00
Television stations with less than 5 kw video power pay $50.00 and
those with 5 kw or more video power pay $100,00.
Associate and Affiliate members pay $10.00 a year. For this fee
members receive our monthly Newsletter| the various reports and sur¬
veys we publish periodically! services of our Placement Service,
television engineer, legal counsel, management consultant, etc.!
plus the normal day to day services, information, and advice that any
national organization gives its members. Under separate cover we are
sending you samples of some of the materials we regularly send our
members, plus other items which will give you more information about
the Association. Of course. Associate and Affiliate numbers do not
receive as many of these materials as regularly as Active members do.
